original_text: Therefore no one will be declared righteous in God’s sight by the works of the law; rather, through the law we become conscious of our sin.
korean_text: 그러므로 율법의 행위로 그의 앞에 의롭다 하심을 얻을 육체가 없나니 율법으로는 죄를 깨달음이니라

sentences.original_text: Therefore no one will be declared righteous
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 아무도 의롭다고 여겨지지 않을 것이니

sentences.original_text: in God's sight by the works of the law
we become conscious of our sin
